# PeeledOnion

> PeeledOnion is lifetime free, cloud-based restaurant billing and POS software for Indian restaurants, cafes, bakeries, and cloud kitchens.

PeeledOnion offers GST-compliant billing, order management, KOT/kitchen display, menu management, inventory tracking, captain/staff app, and cloud storage. No installation or credit card required; works on any device. Target audience: restaurants, cafes, bakeries, cloud kitchens, QSRs, and food-service businesses in India.

## Main

- [Home](https://peeledonion.in/): Free restaurant billing software overview, features summary, how it works, testimonials, FAQ
- [Features](https://peeledonion.in/features): Full feature list â€” billing, menu, KOT, inventory, staff app, cloud, multi-device
- [Pricing](https://peeledonion.in/pricing): Lifetime free pricing; no monthly fees, no credit card; optional premium add-ons
- [Contact](https://peeledonion.in/contact): Contact form and support
- [About](https://peeledonion.in/about): About PeeledOnion and the product

## Product guides

- [Restaurant billing software](https://peeledonion.in/restaurant-billing-software): Guide to free restaurant billing for Indian restaurants
- [Restaurant POS billing](https://peeledonion.in/restaurant-pos-billing): POS and point-of-sale billing overview
- [GST billing software](https://peeledonion.in/gst-billing-software): GST-compliant invoicing and tax billing
- [Inventory management](https://peeledonion.in/inventory-management): Stock and ingredient-level inventory for restaurants
- [Mobile restaurant billing](https://peeledonion.in/mobile-restaurant-billing-software): Mobile and tablet billing
